about_the_game:
Piece Quest is an idle RPG game that aims to provide a great experience, with offline progress included. Assign workers to collect resources and upgrade your buildings. Train your heroes and send them on Hunts and Dungeons. Develop your strategy to defeat the strongest Bosses.

Main Features:

  • Heroes: Choose from 15 different heroes.
  • Skills: Each hero has a unique set of passive and active skills.
  • Strategy: Create strategies to define how your hero behaves during auto-battle.
  • Gathering: Assign workers to gather all necessary resources.
  • Buildings: Upgrade your environment to gain bonuses.
  • Crafting: Craft various types of gear.
  • Bosses: Assemble your heroes to defeat the toughest bosses.
  • Quests: Complete quests to earn great rewards.
  • Achievements: Take on challenges and earn achievements.
  • Offline Progression: Your heroes continue to grow stronger even when the game is closed.

Piece Quest does not contain any microtransactions.
